website_summaries.verdict: Affordable resistance band set that gets the job done for many.
pros: Set of 5 bands with varied resistance
Comes with travel bag for portable exercise
Bands made from genuine rubber that does not ride or roll on skin
cons: Some say they are thinner than expected

customer_reviews.title: Gym in your pocket
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, was not expecting such a high quality for this price. Some cheap bands have this horrible smell of rubber that does not go away with time and stays on the skin after working out - but not those ones! Great quality material, very nice in touch, durable but not bulky, folds fantastically into the provided bag so it's literally a travel-sized pocket gym! Love the gradation too, from light to really heavy. I use them with a set of non-looped bands and I'm getting a better whole body workout than when I was paying for the gym membership (and without the stress of strangers glaring at me as I train!). Definitely worth recommending. :)
customer_reviews.author: Lady Knight

customer_reviews.title: Good for a quick home workout!
customer_reviews.text: I have a gym membership but wanted something for a quick workout on the days where I can't make it to the gym or don't fancy doing too much. These are great for just that. Bands are in a range of tensions and come with a handy storage bag and a leaflet with suggested exercises. It's also useful that they're in different colours so you can quickly identify what tension you want if you're in a rush. This would be so useful for holidays when you can't get to the gym! Arrived quickly and in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: MarvinoTheDinosaur

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Very sturdy. This will last a good few years and is part of my daily routine
customer_reviews.text: After having pain on the inside of my knee for a few weeks I visited a podiatrist in Wrexham. He recommended exercises that required a resistance band just like yours. With new anti pronate insoles tailor made and the exercise regime, I have noticed an improvement in 2 weeks but have still got to keep it going for quite awhile now. I’ve made it part of my daily routine 👍😀very happy with your product thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great selection of bands
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery - arrived sooner than I expected. Like the fact you get a set of 5 and at different strengths/resistances. As a regular gym goer I wanted some bands to help with my stretches and flexibility, having a set of 5 for a reasonable price is a good buy to me. Also I love the little tie-bag they come with, keeps them all together, neat and tidy. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Getting fit is colourful
customer_reviews.text: What I liked was they arrived 2days sooner than expected! I really like the fact that the bands are colour coded and the level of difficulty is printed on each one. I bruise very easily but these bands have been very kind to my sensitive skin. Getting fit is rather enjoyable. The instruction booklet is in many languages with self explanatory pictures. The bands and booklet fit nicely into a carrying bag. The icing on the cake though is all products from this store come with a lifetime warranty. Amazing! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great package for anyone veey easy to use 5 different strength resistances
customer_reviews.text: Great pack 5 different resistances perfect for beginners or experts. Works very well as an added extra to any work out can be perfect for travelling or use at home. Comes in a nice bag for storage. They are perfect for building up muscle strength and mass in workouts aswell as for use with physiotherapy. Can be used for young and old and have the different resistances printed on each band to make it easier to see which is needed. Also comes with a booklet to show different exercise examples on how to use. Perfect package for anyone great quality also
customer_reviews.author: kelly black

customer_reviews.title: Resistance band with heavy ,light.x light and medium
customer_reviews.text: I am happy that these bands comes with 2 heavy and then the other ines are light,x light and medium . They are very flexible and easy to use With different colours so you know which colour belongs to heavy or light .The small black bag to keep them save .X light is good for my daughter . Good quality thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lakhelaba

customer_reviews.title: The different levels of resistance and the handy little carry bag it comes with
customer_reviews.text: I received my Gritin resistance bands so quickly and pleasantly surprised they came with a neat little travel bag, so I can carry them with me without losing any and having to find them all in my gym bag. I’ve have used each level of the bands with leggings and just on my skin. They are comfortable and do they job of exercising with the added resistance wonderfully. Really happy with the product and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Quality bands with fast delivery. Come in a handy pouch different levels of resistance which is great for different parts you want to work or to build up to. I am using them for my upper body. Easier alternative to weights and you can take them anywhere with you. They are small and light. Pleased with my purchase I can use them anywhere so convenient. Would highly recommend the quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs G O Rourke

customer_reviews.title: Quick, portable and very useful
customer_reviews.text: The bands come in a carry case, each held by similar-coloured elastic bands - nice touch! Very useful range of resistances, and a quick trip to YouTube will reveal several exercise sets. The most useful thing about these is that firstly they are very portable (and take no space to store) and can provide a wide-range of exercises in a range of directions, which weights alone don't. Easier on joints and ligaments, they can provide sets that utilise muscles that may not get a look-in with standard gym equipment.
customer_reviews.author: The Padmeister

customer_reviews.title: Does it what says
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for first impressions. Get 5 different elastic strength bands. All different colours with the strength written on each one. Band feels sturdy and the higher strength ones are perfect for using to squat. Injured my hip due to working muscles in my legs without strengthening my hip, been using the black on weighted squats and works quite well. The material isn’t too rough either which means I can put it on my legs without worrying about being burnt or losing all the hairs on my hairy legs. Company seems pretty genuine as well, comes with a little booklet with recommended exercises you can do with each band. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality, Arrived Quickly
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, good price, arrived quickly. Small enough to fit through the letterbox. It came with a perfectly sized pouch so I don't need to worry about them going missing. It also has a handy guide inside of all the exercises you can try with the bands, along with recommendations about which band to use for which type of exercise. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkita

customer_reviews.title: Worst scam in history
customer_reviews.text: The resistance bands are about 1mm thick and that is the X Heavy one (the most thick). They don’t stretch half as much as the resistance bands you’re used to seeing in gyms and give you a constant fear of tearing apart in your face, during a more stretch intensive exercise. I got them for support when doing pull ups and I deffinately can’t use them for that. Thanks for mentioning “gym” in the title of the item. Scam, not worth the money. Buy a classical resistance band with a larger thickness, you can do more things with it...
customer_reviews.author: Andrey

customer_reviews.title: Great value home work out kit
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely fashion and packaged in a box including the five bands of varying resistance and multi-lingual instruction pamphlet and a storage back. The bands are looped and after a wee's use appear to be of good quality. The pamphlet provides a variety of exercise designed to give a work out regime to start with and proves to be quite effective. The bands and pamphlet fit nicely into a net storage bag which is small, light and easy to slip into a travel bag to take with you.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hiscock

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to work on my abs (mainly for my back) and legs, and tried some of the exercises it comes with and had a look online as well. Very useful and you can use them in different ways. They also come in a small bag, where they all fit in, so good to bring them along wherever you go.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Ok I don’t have this even a month and definitely not using it daily. I use gloves for work out as the rubber is very unpleasant to hold. I wasn’t very happy when product arrived but I kept it to give it a go as many good reviews. I think I’m done with this one, to afraid.
customer_reviews.author: Sima

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, storage bag is useful.
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be just what I need, I'll be using these pre and post surgery for rehabilitation. They are graded for resistance and look to be of great quality. My partner has disappeared with two of them, so she must like them as well lol, good item at a fair price. The storage bag supplied is a good touch as they could be misplaced.
customer_reviews.author: Kiltguy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and a great service
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a set of looped resistance bands to do some exercises at home. These are perfect - there are 5 different resistance levels, so they are great if you are a beginner, or more advanced. They also come in a handy bag, so are very portable, and include a leaflet showing exercises that you try with the bands. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne D.

customer_reviews.title: Is this a joke
customer_reviews.text: I'm learning the every product I see with over 1000 reviews needs to be viewed with suspicion. These are cheap rubbish. You can't stretch to full arms length. If you want cheap rubbish, then have fun with this.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Stay clear,. Spend some real money on some bigger, better quality and actually useful ones
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, not sure what exercise you could use this for, they're tiny. The photos are photoshopped, I would stay clear of these. You should some real money and get good quality ones like those in the gym. I am sending these back before using them in any actual exercise as when stretching they feel like they're going to snap and are not big enough to use for anything usefull.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Scott

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, cheap, thin broke one in 20 minutes of using it. If I could give zero I would.
customer_reviews.author: dawn's kindle

customer_reviews.title: Resistance bands
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife who does not go to the gym and prefers to do some simple exercises at home. This pack of resistance band allows her to expand her range of exercises and do some resistance exercises which she could not do before. It is best you look up some you tube videos to see the best exercises possible with this product. Wife is pleased so I am too.
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: They barely go around your head never mind body workouts!
customer_reviews.text: These bands are extremely small. I normally workout in the gym but with the current situation thats not possible. I was hoping to be able to do a few different workouts with these after watching some videos online. These bands are that small I was not able to do anything at all with them. They only just go around my head as a headband they are that small and tight! These are a waste of money, they do have a little information sheet inside for what they can be used for but for me, a man who normally does weights in the gym they are useless.
customer_reviews.author: TheSaint

customer_reviews.title: don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Save up your money for one of the more expensive, fabric resistance bands from a better company. All these ones succeed in doing is rolling up your thighs while working out constantly, interrupting your flow and causing frustration. I've even tried to counter this problem by wearing leggings instead of shorts to create friction and still they persist to roll up and cause pain. Better to save money and get a fabric band than these cheap imitations.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Absoloutely dreadful
customer_reviews.text: These bands are extremely small. I mean minuscule, they are more like headbands than the resistance bands you would find in a gym. The instruction manual shows exercises that are not useful for the average gym-goer and on closer inspection, the images shown on amazon seem to be photoshopped to make these bands appear larger. DO NOT PURCHASE. I am baffled as to how many people have given this product good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: PVL

customer_reviews.title: Weak elastic bands(if you're a pro)
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these elastics are weak and can't be used for athletes, only extreme beginners. On the photo you can see the stretch of their "heaviest" elastic band, and it expands twice as much as a 'medium heavy' elastic band from another brand. If you are used to working out regularly or are an athlete, then these elastic bands will do nothing for you. Even the heaviest one is too weak to be helpful at all during training. A disappointment, I had really been looking forward to using them when I teach classes.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilie

customer_reviews.title: Fitness resistance bands
customer_reviews.text: Love these, and you can really feel them working. Don't overdo it start light and work your way up. You can start with basic exercises. You can sit, stand lie on the floor, even people in wheelchairs could use this muscle-strengthening (without feeling like you are taking on major aerobics). You realise how unfit you may be with these but start small and work your way up. The pack comes with 5 bands, a booklet of exercises and instructions, and a little pouch to keep them in, easy to carry around, or hang them up. Well worth the purchase. Take 5 minutes or half an hour it depends on your fitness levels.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon London

customer_reviews.title: Bought the wrong thing!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I didn’t read the description properly and these bands are too short for my purpose. I wanted one that I can put my foot in and stretch my leg to work my calf muscles.
customer_reviews.author: SylviaH

customer_reviews.title: worst resistance bands keep sliding/twisting very painful
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst resistance bands ever. It makes me wonder how they got any good reviews! READ THE ONE STAR REVIEWS. We are all saying the same thing. They keep slipping and twisting when you are using them which really hurts and cuts off blood supply. It ruins every single one of my workouts and I have to keep stopping to adjust them and not cut off my blood supply. Worst. Do not buy. I have tried using medium and heavy and both the same and rubbish. I have tried on skin and on leggings and same thing happens. Ignore the other reviews. These will destroy your legs and ruin your workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say I’m impressed, they roll all the time and you spend half the time you’re trying to exercise trying to fix them! Waste of money. I’ve bought fabric resistant bands since and they are SOOOO much better. If you can spend a bit more go for the fabric ones
customer_reviews.author: Supasparkle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am an unfit (but trying) 58 year old female. I have spinal stenosis but, as the gym is shut, and I wanted to maintain upper body strength, I decided to buy this set of bands. I started with the yellow medium band. I used it for a month every other day. I just did simple stretching exercises with my arms, aiming to hold the stretch for 15 seconds. The yellow band is now torn across its width. I don’t have a dog, and live alone, so the bands have not been damaged. So I feel, pitching a mid market cost, I feel that these should be pretty strong, and sadly they have let me down.
customer_reviews.author: M L Berry

customer_reviews.title: Not fit for purpose
customer_reviews.text: Finally got round to using these bands and they aren't fit for purpose. They constantly roll up. I have tried them in all different ways to prevent this but certain moves are just a no go with these on. Tried to just carry on regardless and the band really digs in and hurts the side of the legs. Tried just constantly readjusting but this was frustrating and totally ruined the workout, due to missing reps. I couldn't fully get into it and give it my all. Totally pointless. Its a shame because the quality for the price paid looks alright and they are pretty easy to use but they are unusable. Very disappointed, feel like I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Hevs

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Initially had high hopes for these bands, however upon delivery today I noticed the X Light (green) band is not uniform, the band becomes thinner, meaning the thinner part will feel more tension and could break. Moreover, after just 2 minutes of mild use, the Light (blue) band has started to break.
customer_reviews.author: Dexter Cole

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these resistance bands because of the good reviews they had! When I came to use them for a workout they just rolled up into into a thin tube which made it incredibly uncomfortable to exercise while wearing them. They do not stay in place and I find myself needing to adjust them every few seconds of the workout! I wish I could send these back for a refund but I am so gutted I chucked the box our before attempting to use the bands! Please do not waste your money and purchase fabric ones, buy cheap buy twice! Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Justin McLellan

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Awful tiny flimsy and just not worth it I really should have sent them back. I am a large woman and theses were no good ever
customer_reviews.author: gemma gilfoyle

customer_reviews.title: Very bad quality
customer_reviews.text: These bands are very bad quality. The red band has snapped and the yellow band has a tear so I'm guessing that is about to snap as well. This is after normal use over about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: They are very short so unable to do most exercises unless it’s for legs and even then no extension possible - the rubber gathers making it uncomfortable and hard to use. I would like to know how to send back for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Sarah McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Look good
customer_reviews.text: These bands arrived very promptly,nicely packed with leaflet for exercises.The bands are in vibrant colours and graded in strength I cannot comment on durability as have only had them for 3days but they appear to be well made so should be ok. I deducted one star because I have not used them sufficiently to know how they will perform but am more than hopeful that they deserve 5stars
customer_reviews.author: Charlie  Brown

customer_reviews.title: USEFUL BUT TOO SHORT
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with quality etc but these are FAR too short for most full body exercises. For example, you can't loop one round your foot, stand vertical with the other end looped in your hand and work it. That means it won't work for many exercises. The chart that comes with them makes this clear but not the words with the ad online. Why aren't I returning them? They are very very handy to have nearby all the time for a range of simple but effective upper body work while some of the leg exercises are easier with these than longer loops.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Rzoska

customer_reviews.title: Ok for light use and the price
customer_reviews.text: Resistance strength is ok! Went from an xtra heavy on these to a medium on one of the fabric Grace Fit bands so these definitely are no way near as strong. 3 stars because they roll up your legs when working out doing some exercises, e.g leg kicks when on all fours, and then dig into you and it’s hopeless and you can’t continue. They are also painful on bare skin. Fine quality for the price you pay but if you intend on using them often I suggest investing in some sturdy fabric ones.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased! Really helping with my shoulder injury
customer_reviews.text: The story: During lockdown I ended up making cycling my daily activity to keep the fat at bay... unfortunately I was hit by a car and badly damaged my shoulder on hitting the ground. As a result I couldn't really bear weight on the arm and didn't have a full range of movement so I was recommended that I start small by using resistance bands. The product: I paid £9.99 for these bands and think they're great. Very durable and a great range of resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Super bands
customer_reviews.text: Well I have recently received this bands and so far so good. Have used them and followed some of the simple steps which come with the bands. I do know of other exercises which I will incorporate. They seem to be of good quality but of course they are still new so will see how they wear during use. Good range of strengths so looking forward to working through them. Have been using mid weight for most leg exercises but I was regular gym user until lockdown! If you totally new start with the lightest and see how you go
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Quarantine workouts
customer_reviews.text: Arrived the next day after placing the order, although the delivery date was estimated to be about 1.5 weeks. A nice addition to your leg/glute workouts. A mini booklet comes with it which has different exercises that you can do with the bands which I found very helpful and a mini pouch to keep your bands safe! Only downside (and this is usually expected of rubber/vinyl material) is that they roll down and I often find myself pulling them back up to position. Otherwise, very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Ng

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised. Too short.
customer_reviews.text: Don't be fooled by the photos. These are nowhere as long as shown on the pictures. They are about 30, 40 cm and reach 50, 60 cm when stretched. They are not suitable for many exercises and deem useless.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Petrov

customer_reviews.title: They break very quickly
customer_reviews.text: I have a set set of them, they broke very quickly, but though I was unlucky and bought a new set, which broke on the first training. Very poor quality, they snap even under mild usage. I was using it to stretch chest muscle, so it wasn't subject to heavy strain.
customer_reviews.author: Charles D.

customer_reviews.title: OK.
customer_reviews.text: I like that you have 5 choices of resistance. The lighter ones are very easy. They come with a little bag that you can keep them in and a booklet of suggested exercises. They roll up which is annoying. Fabric ones are probably better for avoiding that. Quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Gill

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Ever got back in shape in 30 days?! Honestly never thought it was possible. One of my friends told me 30 days straight of 25 minutes a day resistance bands exercises would get me in shape. Okay why would anyone believe that? Resistance bands are one product that keep you consistent. It's just impossible to say “ I couldn't hit the gym today”. So I'm all in for bands. But the latex ones get annoying after a while, so I bought theseand its just comfortable for everyday use. Additionally, these bands provide a bit more stability when I'm doing my squats. I love the thickness. I would invest in both!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: So popular in our house, I've ordered more!
customer_reviews.text: I am using these as part of an exercise programme I am following. My teenage children are using them for their own exercises. The bands come with a leaflet of suggested exercises you can also do. The range of strengths mean that they can be used by beginners, right through to those wanting extra burn! The bands arrived really quickly, which is a good job because I've ordered a couple more sets since the first purchase so that we don't have to fight over them! I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Livesey

customer_reviews.title: Bands are very small
customer_reviews.text: When first arrived they looked nice. I liked all the sizes that they done as well. Then I tried the first size just above the knees, no matter where I placed it it would just roll together. There was no way it was going to go on the thighs. The bands are incredibly small. The photos cannot be using the bands I was sent as they seem to be half the size and would roll up if I tried to do any of the exercises in the photo. I'm really disappointed with them.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Try them you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made the instructions are a handy hint to using them . The resistance of the various bands makes it a useful training tool. Now you may think that heavy weights at the gym are the only way but you like me may be surprised at what benefits can be achieved from the comfort of your home . So I bought these after having watched people online using similar products and I'm not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bands, shorter than expected
customer_reviews.text: These bands are about 24" in diameter, which is smaller than I expected but I should have looked more closely! However, this is a perfectly good size for pulling say, 1 arms length to body. You couldn't push both arms out sideways with them! Lots of sizes included and in a draw string bag too. They seem well made (so far).
customer_reviews.author: Scale70

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This are my first resistance bands and I absolutely love them. I also managed to persuade my husband to do exercises together and he was sceptical at first, but he liked it too! And boy, I feel so much more of my muscles are involved than after a month of the heavy lifting in the gym. Particularly my back I struggled to engage before. I'm very happy with the purchase. A nice touch - a nice letter from the company. Product is top quality indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: I want a refund
customer_reviews.text: I’m really hoping the seller will reply to this. But I purchased yesterday for them to come today. Just gone to do some stretching, all excited and they have just completely snapped!! 4 out of the 5!! I want a refund as I’ve had to throw them away!! Please can I get a reply as I’ve wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Bunting

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with these
customer_reviews.text: These bands defied my expectations. For the price I wasn't expecting a huge amount, but they're great. They come in a little net bag which makes keeping them together useful. The quality seems there too. Each band has a clear difference in resistance. I can't comment on their durability but I have been using them regularly for about a month and in some cases with trainers on and they seem to be holding up well. Would thoroughly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. Van

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: These are a great product. Brought before lockdown and have finally used them! Good range from extra light to extra heavy. There is a useful instruction manual included and a bag to keep them together. Loads of resistance band workouts on You Tube, however I have used them in addition to the HITT sessions I have been doing. Great whilst the gyms aren’t open and a good addition to the weights I have.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Woodhead

customer_reviews.title: Good for a workout
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, coloured rubber makes it easy to see which resistance you are using, and comes in a small pouch which will hold all the bands. There is a small sheet of instructions which I didn't really need. What did surprise me was how short they are, although they do the job if you are stuck in the house. Recommended but understand your needs before buying this kind of product.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Fox

customer_reviews.title: very good but are on the small side
customer_reviews.text: I already have exercise bands, so when these came. I immediately noticed they were in an a5 size envelope box, which kind of made me wonder what I bought. these are very good, very light, and durable exercise bands, but for their size, they give me very limited amount of options. I wished they were a lot longer so that I could add them to much more of my exercise routines.
customer_reviews.author: TAHIR KHAN

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor roll up easily hole in one already don't stretch out far enough very flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good entry level product
customer_reviews.text: Good entry level product I bought these to help strengthen my leg muscles Some of the bands are more used from injuries and are very light so I only use those ones if I was recovering from a leg injury Only used few times so far cannot say how long they will last, but material seems good and if used correctly as per instructions should last me a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Philip S Chalkley

customer_reviews.title: Pointless and unable to do any exercises
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the bands roll up with any basic movements rendering them useless and needing constant readjustment thereby disrupting your workout. I only use them on my legs and I'm unable to do donkey kicks etc. Honestly, just save yourself £15 and buy something made of fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Rosey

customer_reviews.title: Keep rolling up
customer_reviews.text: The resistance bands arrived quite quickly and smell strongly of Latex which doesn't bother me personally. Even as an exercise beginner, I find the lowest two bands too light to be used for anything. The material gets thinner the "lighter" the resistance bands are and is prone to rolling up and twisting. Only with the two heaviest (where the material is thicker) it didn't roll up as much, but I still find myself fixing the bands between every other exercise, wasting a lot of time. Next time I will go for fabric ones. These ones get the job done, but that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Kim

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I hoped they'd be
customer_reviews.text: These resistance bands are exactly what I'd hoped they'd be. They arrived promptly and have a little bag to keep them in. There are five resistance levels and all are clearly marked (and different colours, obviously). They look exactly like the ones at my gym. Time will tell as to how long lasting they are but they seem sturdy enough. Very happy with these, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkike

customer_reviews.title: Great first bands
customer_reviews.text: My first ever set, good entry level kit. bought two packs to help with double handed exercises or to make longer bands by simply knotting two, three or four together. I have already torn one blue one but despite this I would buy again as overall a good product when you have nothing. As an advanced exerciser I would progress onto longer heavier bands or carabiner style. But these are great to teach yourself how to use them. 👍
customer_reviews.author: steven p rowell

customer_reviews.title: Small resistance bands!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to increase my home exercise. Was hoping to use them for bicep curls, but they are too small. I didn't read the description properly. They measure approximately 30cm circumference. If you sit down, you can put your foot through one and curl with it, but you can't do much else. Currently trying to figure out how I can still use them, but they are just a little too small. Good quality and fast deliver, just a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B-N

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a beginner but LOVE THESE BANDS!
customer_reviews.text: I am an experienced gym-goer for the past 8 years i have been strength training however i have only used bands as an assist and not as my main exercises because i used to believe they would not be difficult enough for me after being used to lifting heavy. However, with the current lockdown, i decided to start gathering equipment at home and decided to try these because of the great reviews and the different levels of difficulty. I am so glad i did! i have managed to use them already not simply for kickbacks, standing abductions and hip bridges but ive also used them to make my weighted exercises at home harder! Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Londonstudent

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: For sure better than I expected. The 'heaviest' band is actually pretty strong and requires quite a bit of force, which is good because it means the bands give quite a big range of resistances. The quality seems very good, doesn't have any seems and repeated (albeit limited number) stretches seem to not effect the bands resistance and the print. Impressed.
customer_reviews.author: ow

customer_reviews.title: Durable and useful
customer_reviews.text: These are great for working out at home, and once we are allowed out again after lockdown I will be taking them to the gym as well. They come with a useful little carry bag which was a nice surprise! The resistances are clearly marked, obviously the highest resistance is quite a challenge, but that is something to work towards! Really good value and arrived very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: stephcoogy

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend: Pro: -Come with a storage bag -Strong material -Great having the different levels -exactly what I needed Cons: -Not wide enough for using for ballet feet stretches/stretching Achilles’ tendon as keep falling off foot! (But work great round legs as designed for strength workouts) -The packaging uses a huge amount of plastic every band individually wrapped
customer_reviews.author: lyra

customer_reviews.title: Excelled my expectation
customer_reviews.text: Resistance bands came in fast time, packaged well, even had a drawstring bag to place back in when finished using after a workout.. Very good quality, marked on different colour bands of the resistance level... Used bands on my legs, and arms, wanted more toning, legs to strengthen, which helped with my running.. Could not fault product, excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Vixs 67

customer_reviews.title: A good set of resistance bands
customer_reviews.text: I bought these during lockdown as I was following workout routines from home. There is a really good selection of bands here. Personally, I mainly use the medium and the heavy one. Suitable for upper and lower body workouts. A great addition for anyone who wants to equipment that is portable and hardly takes up any space.
customer_reviews.author: LM Ingamells

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I wanted bands that were easy to carry around. I wanted ones that could assist me with getting back in to general exercises and help speed up weight loss and toning. I'm not a 'fitness freak' just average - so talk it with a pinch of salt. I'm using them for squats, leg raises, pull ups, arms and to support me during pilates in general. I'm say size 14/16. The yellow band folded a couple times around my thigh but the elasticity has definitely been maintained so far; without cause for concern. Maybe there's different types out there but this does the trick for me now... especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: OK for the money, not great for glutes/thighs
customer_reviews.text: These bands are OK overall, good selection of different resistance levels for the money. They also came quickly. They're not really suitable for some movements where you have them round thighs as they move and/or roll up, which is quite uncomfortable. They also feel like they might not last that long for that kind of workout. Probably better for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: LP3016

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bands
customer_reviews.text: The bands are good quality, colour coded going from X Light to X Heavy, I love the little bag they come in too, my only issue is they are a little small and for some things you really need to stretch them out making the movement harder than you need even with the lightest band,, good for keg work but no so much for upper body. Better suited to workouts than therapy. Overall though, I am happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: For us beginning out it's great. Little book tells you some exercises to do. The range in strength of bands is great. Only reason I didn't give a 5 star is I can't get the bands back in the black net bag after iv opened them all. Also the exercises on YouTube etc show different resistance bands that you can tie around stuff etc. These are good and some videos to follow so good value and worth getting
customer_reviews.author: vikki

customer_reviews.title: Have so far stood the test of use
customer_reviews.text: These are mega frustrating when they roll up, as i expect every other resistance band does also. But they haven't broken yet, even at times when i was scared i was pulling it far too much. They have really helped me to burn the legs, really makes squat walks that much harder. the handy travel bag they come with is great, makes for easy and convenient storage and carrying. Hopefully these last soooo much longer for plenty more burn.
customer_reviews.author: Keller63

customer_reviews.title: Great for home workouts
customer_reviews.text: Not really a fan if going to the gym so these are great for using at home, the colours mean different strengths of resistance. They’re very easy to use and a booklet is included with some examples of workouts you can do.
customer_reviews.author: Callum

customer_reviews.title: Good value and very practical.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a set of bands to use with my physiotherapy exercises after an injury and prolonged period of enforced inactivity. The bands are perfect for such use - involving mainly small, precise movement of the limbs. They come with a convenient draw-string bag. (Please note that these are the relatively small loops of rubber - not the long wide strips of latex cut off a roll that are often used in (for example) diet/exercise classes.)
customer_reviews.author: Ragiggman

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to exercise at home
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used these for a long time but so far the delivery condition was great, love the pouch you get with them and they feel quite elastic and have a good thickness. They don't feel like they're going to snap any minute (even the X Light band). Compared to a brand I used to have before (of which one band snapped) they seem a few notches better. I can't rate the durability yet, I can only hope they last longer than the previous ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed!  They won't stay flat.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not impressed with these at all. First time using one, it kept curling up, it would not stay flat on my legs, I would fix it flat and as soon as started exercising again would curl up, like a very tight elastic band around your legs, ouch, it hurt. I was on edge incase it snapped. I will invest in some fabric ones because I don't want to have to stop and start and want comfort too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cooney

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: These arent fabric elastic. They're baisically big elastic bands. They feel very flimsy, I tried them on my legs and they rolled down and didnt stay tidy, at all. I don't like them at all. They feel very cheap. The bag they come in is alright.
customer_reviews.author: hana marie

customer_reviews.title: Too Small for gym exercise
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the product is good. The bands are too small for bicep curls even though the booklet shows you can, but that is a demo of a half bicep curl to 90 deg while you are seated on a small chair or stool. I cannot do a full bicep curl with these bands as they are too short. You also cannot do press-ups, squats, chest exercise, shoulder press. These are best for things like pilates or yoga. I now have to look around again for longer resistance bands as i need resistance bands long enough to do gym exercises as seen on the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher T.

customer_reviews.title: Discreet to carry around and ideal for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: A good resource to help exercise anywhere! I keep them in my car so that I always have them, I use them at home in the garden as well as inside. Very discreet to carry around. The bands can be used in smaller spaces if you don’t have much space. They are strong. I love the colours too.
customer_reviews.author: woko101

customer_reviews.title: Not for long term use
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last long. Got a good amount of use from them but they dried up and 3 of the colour levels have finally snapped. Not sure if they were designed for continuous use. But lockdown had me without a choice. Next time I'll just buy a set of dumbbells Bargain price but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew McKay

customer_reviews.title: Don't extend enough for a full stretch.
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality bands. Unfortunately, they don't allow for full extension and feel like they're going to snap. Full movement is important with all exercises, if you aren't allowed to perform full motion, then what's the point? My partner is only 5ft 4ins and the bands failed her with full extension also.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Joseph G. Black

customer_reviews.title: Not the best resistance bands
customer_reviews.text: The resistance bands are good for their price, they come packaged well and are good for starting out, the only problem I have with them is the keep rolling whole using them which is very uncomfortable especially since they are rubber. Also because they are rubber bands, you are better off wearing them with leggings instead of shorts because they stick to your skin. Other than thr fact they roll all the time, they are OK as a first set of bands and are decent enough quality for the price of them considering you get 5 in a bag with a nice bag to keep them safe in. I'd probably recommend thicker bands for comfort though.
customer_reviews.author: Aoife Whyte

customer_reviews.title: Impeccable product, couldn’t fault anything
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my resistance bands, I initially bought them to recover from a pulled hamstring and to build the muscle. I now use them daily to build muscle throughout my body, I’ve never felt so healthy and alive. The stretch hasn’t worn out, I’ve had them just over 6 months and they’re still like brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Fielding

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with everything about them. Like the different colours with the level on and like the bag to keep them in. Had a little go so far and they will be perfect for strengthening and muscle building. They are really versatile for different body areas too. Good price for the set of 5 too.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Rolls up and becomes painful
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why this product has so many good reviews! When used, the bands would roll up and become quite painful, therefore, I was unable to use them. Returned and awaiting refund
customer_reviews.author: ChimChima

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great selection of bands in lovely colours, obviously with different resistances. Very versatile to use for exercise, toning or to help with physio exercises for injuries, post op, etc Seem to be well made, very reasonably priced so definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: caroline

customer_reviews.title: Not as long as I had anticipated
customer_reviews.text: The bands are not as lon as I thought they might be. I used fitness straps before but thought the bands would be easier. They are good for leg exercises but don’t stretch far enough for arms/shoulder exercises. The gradient between each strength is good.
customer_reviews.author: gail

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Resistance Bands
customer_reviews.text: Currently needed these for physio exercise - perfect! Will also be using them for fitness exercise soon. Love the pouch for keeping them together. Good idea that they are different colours and best of all they are clearly marked with their strengths. Pleased with the quality and price and speed of delivery.
customer_reviews.author: eBook Convert

customer_reviews.title: Cut down on the plastic
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today and look and feel very durable. Exactly what i was after so i can do some exercises outside of gym sessions. Only downside is each band is wrapped in individual plastic which i think is a waste and better packaging means could be found rather than using plastics. Looking forward to using these!
customer_reviews.author: Digi

customer_reviews.title: very versatile
customer_reviews.text: bought these to recover from injury and will be working them into daily exercise from now on. Good quality so far and different levels of resistance are great for variety of exercises. Just be mindful that these are actually mini bands and may be shorter than you expect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Break Quickly and Price Increases
customer_reviews.text: Red band broke after less than 20 uses. Price has nearly doubled in 6 weeks from £7.99 to £12.99. Taking blatant advantage of COVID situation.
customer_reviews.author: Yavenushca

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly , nicely packed . First resistance bands I’ve bought so I can’t say how versatile or durable they are . I will update in future . I put luggage scales on them and pulled them out to about 32 inches to measure the resistance . From x-light to x-heavy the resistance in lbs is :- 6.6 , 8.9 , 12.9 , 19.4 , 20.9
customer_reviews.author: IrateIan

customer_reviews.title: Small, flimsy, but a good start
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly good little bands. Emphasising the little part. They are extremely short and quite unlikely to comfortably fit anywhere other than between your feet (and unlikely to stretch too far without fear of snapping), or for simple arm pull apart to about just over a shoulders breadth apart. For anything else, they are simply too short and flimsy. For beginners though, they are quite a useful aid to get started in the exercise band world.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use as many gyms were closed. Haven’t disappointed me yet - easy to use for beginners, a range of resistance levels to choose from, and definitely gets you sweating if you follow a more complex exercise plan or the simple workout instructions provided. I have already recommended this product to friends and family. Additionally, the lower level bands have helped strengthen my ankle which was weakened after rolling it during 5-a-side football.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Jerrard

customer_reviews.title: Recovery
customer_reviews.text: Lost a lot of weight and muscle mass last year due to depression, great way to get back on track the weakest band (green one) is a great strength to start off with. The bands always come with a small brochure with suggested exercises, really good for if you don’t have any idea what kind of exercises to start off with.
customer_reviews.author: Ai Matcha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bands
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for some good resistance bands for workouts, look no further. This is my second order of these bands as the first were nicked by my parents when I brought them over for a workout- they just work as they should. Non-slip, good quality and all packaged together in a mesh pouch. Highly recommend! Seller was quick to respond and delivery was faster than expected!
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: Very good but 3 out of 5 of mine have broken!
customer_reviews.text: They're very good and well priced too. I've used them every other day for about a month during lockdown but 3 of mine have snapped and become unusable now! Didn't expect them to snap at all really and I've not been doing anything out of the ordinary either so fairly disappointing because they've been very good up until then.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
